data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Nascimento, Elynton Alves Do, Bocakova, Milada (2017): Neolinoptes gen. n., a replacement name for the net-winged beetle genus Linoptes Gorham, 1884 and a new species of Lycomorphon from Guyana (Coleoptera: Lycidae). Zootaxa 4216 (4): 395-400, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.242214|6 occurrences
